meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Saul Rollason Judy Olson John Lindquist Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4403.

div.div: Game data retrieved from an alternate archive.

td.p: Saul Rollason, a business owner from Hilo, Hawaii
Judy Olson, a college teacher from Los Angeles, California
John Lindquist, an attorney from Marietta, Georgia (whose 2-day cash winnings total $33,201)

tr.td: SCIENTISTS
MUSIC TO MY EARS
AN "F" IN HISTORY
LEFTOVERS
PRINCETON
IN OTHER WORDS...

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Upon her husband\'s death in 1906, she succeeded him as Professor of Physics at the Sorbonne')
